trends: There have been 6 other sightings in San Mateo
There were no other sightings in San Mateo on or around October 31st 2008
Summary: I went out to my back yard to smoke and I looked up at the sky which was overcast from the rain today, and below the cloud cover moving due south was an object that appeared to me to look like a one inch horizontal line with cream colored lights blinking
divs: Sighting DetailsI went out to my back yard to smoke and I looked up at the sky which was overcast from the rain today, and below the cloud cover moving due south was an object that appeared to me to look like a one inch horizontal line with cream colored lights blinking from left to right. It was like they were blinking like this: * then ** then *** ***** ****** and then blank, and it would start back at one light again. I've never seen anything similar to this, it made no sound and moved slowly; not what I'd expect from a UFO. Could you please confirm this sighting or tell me that you received no other reports, just let me know either way.
